content.query:
SELECT
    COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://store0sales0data.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/SalesLT/Product/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result] 

SELECT
    COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://store0sales0data.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/SalesLT/Product/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result] 

SELECT
    COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://store0sales0data.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/SalesLT/Product/*',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result] 

ORDER BY ProductCategoryID ASC
